text: huwa alladhi anzala ʿalayka l-kitaba min'hu ayatun muh'kamatun hunna ummu l-kitabi wa-ukharu mutashabihatun fa-amma alladhina fi qulubihim zayghun fayattabiʿuna ma tashabaha min'hu ib'tighaa l-fit'nati wa-ib'tighaa tawilihi wama yaʿlamu tawilahu illa l-lahu wal-rasikhuna fi l-ʿil'mi yaquluna amanna bihi kullun min ʿindi rabbina wama yadhakkaru illa ulu l-albabi
